executionTasks.name: Configure OAuth Credentials for All 6 Platforms
executionTasks.description: Add CLIENT_ID and CLIENT_SECRET for Meta, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Google, TikTok
findings: Environment validation script extended with OAuth validators
blockers: OAuth credentials not yet populated in .env
Requires access to each platform's developer console
Client IDs must be numeric (platform-specific format)

executionTasks.name: Whitelist OAuth Redirect URIs on All Platforms
findings: State validation in place via oauth-state-cache
All OAuth endpoints ready to receive callbacks
blockers: Must manually configure on Meta developer console
Must manually configure on LinkedIn developer console
Must manually configure on Twitter developer console
Must manually configure on Google developer console
Instagram uses Facebook app (same as Meta)
TikTok requires separate configuration
evidence: OAuth manager with state validation in place

executionTasks.name: Create Go-Live Procedures Documentation
executionTasks.description: Generate GO_LIVE_PLAYBOOK.md with deployment, rollback, and verification procedures

executionTasks.name: Execute Infrastructure Load Tests
executionTasks.description: Load test database + queue with simulated production workload
findings: Bull Queue with Redis ready for testing

executionTasks.name: Configure Datadog Dashboards and Alerts
executionTasks.description: Create dashboards for Connectors, Queue, Errors, API latency and configure alerts
findings: Pino logger ready for Datadog integration
blockers: DATADOG_API_KEY not set in .env
Dashboard JSON templates need to be imported
Alert webhook URLs need configuration
